Name: Foltest King of Temeria
ability_description: Pick an Impenetrable Fog card from your deck and play it instantly.

Name: Foltest Lord Commander of the North
description: Sod advisors and their schemes. I place my trust in my soldiers blades.
ability_description: Clear any weather effects (resulting from Biting Frost, Torrential Rain, or Impenetrable Fog cards) in play.

Name: Foltest the Siegemaster
description: A well-aimed ballista razes not just the enemys walls, but his morale as well.
ability_description: Doubles the strength of all your Siege units (unless a Commander's Horn is also present on that row).

Name: Foltest the Steel-Forged
ability_description: Destroy your enemy's strongest Siege unit(s) if the combined strength of all his or her Siege units is 10 or more.

Name: Eredin Bringer of Death
ability_description: Restore a card from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Eredin Commander of the Red Riders
description: Go on. Show me your spins, pirouettes and feints. I want to watch.
ability_description: Double the strength of all your Close Combat units (unless a Commander's horn is also present on that row).

Name: Eredin Destroyer of Worlds
ability_description: Discard 2 cards and draw 1 card of your choice from your deck.

Name: Eredin King of the Wild Hunt
description: Have some dignity. You know how this will end.
ability_description: Pick any weather card from your deck and play it instantly.

Name: Emhyr var Emreis Emperor of Nilfgaard
description: Your motives do not interest me. Only results.
ability_description: Look at 3 random cards from your opponent's hand.

Name: Emhyr var Emreis His Imperial Majesty
description: The skies wept when my Pavetta died. They will not weep for me.
ability_description: Pick a Torrential Rain card from your deck and play it instantly.

Name: Emhyr var Emreis the Relentless
description: They do not call me the Patient. Take care they do not call you the Headless.
ability_description: Draw a card from your opponent's discard pile.

Name: Emhyr var Emreis the White Flame
description: A sword is but one of many tools at a rulers disposal.
ability_description: Passive: Cancel your opponent's Leader Ability.

Name: Francesca Findabair the Beautiful
description: The Elder Races have forgotten more than humans can ever hope to know.
ability_description: Doubles the strength of all your Ranged Combat units (unless a Commander's Horn is also present on that row).

Name: Francesca Findabair Daisy of the Valley
description: Do not let my beauty distract your aim.
ability_description: Passive: Draw an extra card at the beginning of the battle.

Name: Francesca Findabair Pureblood Elf
description: To live in peace, we first must kill. This is human oppressions cruel finale.
ability_description: Pick a Biting Frost card from your deck and play it instantly.

Name: Francesca Findabair Queen of Dol Blathanna
description: Ash shall fertilize the soil. By spring the valley shall bloom once more.
ability_description: Destroy your enemy's strongest Close Combat unit(s) if the combined strength of all his or her Close Combat units is 10 or more.
